personal.title: Data Analyst & Business Intelligence Specialist
personal.bio: MSc Business Analytics Candidate at UCD Dublin
personal.tagline: I turn messy data into clear insights and actionable strategies.

about.subtitle: Where I studied
paragraphs: I'm a passionate data analyst with expertise in transforming complex datasets into actionable business insights. My background combines strong analytical foundations with practical experience in building data solutions that drive strategic decisions.

I specialize in SQL database design, Python for data processing, and creating compelling visualizations in Tableau and Power BI. I'm particularly interested in business intelligence, data governance, and helping organizations unlock the value in their data.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
highlights: Built automated ETL pipelines reducing manual reporting time by 40%
Created real-time dashboards monitoring KPIs for executive leadership
Identified data quality issues affecting 2+ business metrics

experience.title: Business Analyst
highlights: Analyzed customer behavior data to identify retention opportunities
Designed and validated A/B testing framework improving conversion by 15%
Collaborated with product team to define data requirements for new features

experience.title: Data Science Intern
highlights: Developed predictive models for customer churn with 85% accuracy
Automated monthly reporting process saving 8 hours per week
Documented data pipelines and best practices for team reuse

projects.title: AI-Powered Meeting Minutes Generator
projects.description: Automated system using Whisper AI for transcription and LLM-powered summarization

projects.title: AIB Risk Capital Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive dashboard analyzing credit risk and capital allocation strategies

projects.title: SQL Data Warehouse + BI Dashboard
projects.description: Star schema data warehouse with automated ETL and interactive Tableau dashboard

projects.title: Data Quality + KPI Monitoring
projects.description: Automated data quality checks with real-time KPI monitoring and alerts

projects.title: Data Governance Mini-System
projects.description: Data catalog with ownership tracking and quality scoring system

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction Model
projects.description: ML model predicting customer churn with 87% accuracy and interactive visualizations

volunteer.description: Lead monthly workshops teaching SQL and data visualization to aspiring analysts. Mentored 15+ students in their first data projects.
Mentor women transitioning into data roles, providing career guidance and technical support. Helped 5 mentees secure analyst positions.
Built donation tracking dashboard for non-profit organization, enabling data-driven fundraising strategy. Saved organization 10+ hours monthly.

contact.heading: Let's create something amazing together
contact.message: I'm always interested in discussing data-driven solutions and new opportunities. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat about analytics, feel free to reach out.
